com.attlassian.hipchatext.models

Class ChatInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.attlassian.hipchatext.models.ChatInfo

  • public class ChatInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by khacpham on 8/15/15.
    The class hold metadata of a chat item (mentions, emoticons, links).
    To display data in pretty json format see toStringJson()
